@graph.name: A Simple AI Prompt For SEO Titles
@graph.description: The following is the process to use the “Simple Reword SEO Title” prompt that is available in the Optizen AI public prompt repository. The Prompt Where To Use This AI Prompt This prompt is specific to the SEO title of Shopify products. You can can use the prompt in it’s raw form from the repository, […]

step.name: Navigate to product tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update. Use the check boxes to select the products.

step.name: Select the prompt
step.text: Select the 'Simple Reword SEO Title' from the drop down under the SEO title prompt field. Ensure you are using the prompt repository tab. Be sure to check the box for 'Update this section'. Then click Proceed.

step.name: Run the prompt
step.text: Click Proceed to run the prompt. On completion, check the output using the Log section of the app. You can then choose to keep or restore the update.

mainEntity.name: Where can I use this AI prompt?

acceptedAnswer.text: This prompt is specific to the SEO title of Shopify products. You can use the prompt in its raw form from the repository, or edit and add to it for your specific use case.

mainEntity.name: When should I use this prompt?

acceptedAnswer.text: This prompt can be used for any product in your Shopify store using the Optizen AI app if you want a simple way to create a more unique SEO title for products and distinguish the title from other stores who may be using the same products or same vendor catalogs. It's particularly useful for drop shipping stores or stores that use shared inventory.

@graph.name: SEO Title
@graph.description: Meta title for search engine optimization that should not exceed 60 characters

@graph.name: Drop Shipping
@graph.description: Business model where stores sell products without keeping inventory, often using shared vendor catalogs

@graph.name: Prompt Repository
@graph.description: Collection of pre-built AI prompts available in Optizen AI for various SEO tasks
